text: Everyone, turn off your cameras!
results: Last player drinks

text: Everyone, mute your mic!
results: Last player drinks

text: Everyone, write your name backwards in the chat!
results: Last player drinks

text: Everyone, submit a funny meme in the chat!
results: Last player drinks. Pick the worst meme, player who submitted it drinks twice.

text: Everyone, stand up and face away from the camera!
results: Last player drinks

text: Everyone, type the day of the month in the chat!
results: Last player drinks. Anyone who was incorrect drinks.

text: Everyone, post a link for 6 finger gloves in the chat.
results: First submission wins. Everyone else drinks.

text: Everyone, in the chat post a link for a shirt for sale with at least 3 unicorns on it.
results: First submission wins. Everyone else drinks.

text: Everyone, in the chat post a link for a coffee mug with brass knuckles as the handle.
results: First submission wins. Everyone else drinks.

text: On the count of 3, everyone type the name of a body part in the chat.
results: Players who submitted the most common answer are safe. Everyone else drink.

text: Everyone, in the chat post a link for a bobble head of Pee-Wee Herman.
results: First submission wins. Everyone else drinks.

text: Everyone, in the chat post a link for a Bill Cosby Fan Group.
results: First submission wins. Everyone else drinks.

text: Everyone, in the chat post a link of a someone dancing to Mambo #5.
results: First submission wins. Everyone else can either drink or listen to 30 seconds of the song.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, sing YMCA 1 word at a time.
results: First player to mess up drinks.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, say the alphabet backwards.
results: First player to mess up drinks.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, starting with the number 1 and going up, say the next prime number.
results: First player to mess up drinks.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, multiply 2 by itself. Next player multiplies that number by 2 and so on.
results: First player to mess up drinks.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, say a compliment to the person next to you.
results: First player to smile drinks.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, say words that rhyme with 'orange'.
results: First player to say doorhinge drinks.

text: Starting with you and going clockwise, say European Countries.
results: First player to say mess up drinks.

text: On the count of 3, type the name of a player in this game.
results: Drink once for every person who submitted the same name as you.

text: On the count of 3, type the name of a player in this game.
results: Drink if you're a loser and no one wrote your name.

text: Everyone has 30 seconds to retrieve a red object.
results: Drink if you fail.

text: Everyone has 30 seconds to retrieve blade of grass.
results: Drink if you fail.

text: Everyone has 30 seconds to retrieve a picture of a dog.
results: Drink if you fail.

text: Everyone has 30 seconds to retrieve an object of your choice.
results: Drink if you fail.

text: Everyone has 15 seconds to get on a phone call with someone else in this game.
results: Drink if you fail.
